lead_paragraph: A report in the Goal soccer roundup on Tuesday about competitive bidding to host the 2018 and the 2022 World Cup tournaments referred incorrectly to a past business affiliation of David Downs, a member of the United States organizing committee. He is a former president of Univision Sports, a division of the Spanish-language media company Univision. He is not a former chief executive of Univision.
